data.name: OpML'20
data.description: The 2020 USENIX Conference on Operational Machine Learning (OpML ’20) will take place on May 1, 2020, at the Hyatt Regency Santa Clara in Santa Clara, CA, USA.

relatedRecords.name: RedisConf 2020
relatedRecords.description: Come to RedisConf 2020 to join us on Redis’ remarkable evolution into the most-versatile, highest-performance, must-have database technology for building elegant, high-performance applications.

relatedRecords.name: MLOps NYC19
relatedRecords.description: The MLOps NYC conference focuses on managing and automating machine learning pipelines, to bring data science into business applications with Kubeflow, AI, serverless, pipeline automation and GPU acceleration.
